body:
when you get out of work and you're in that pre-dinner "what are we going to watch tonight" phase and then remember that your favorite show is on that night

_the bachelorette_, even though the hometown visits were not as interesting as i wanted them to be and they've been stringing us along for weeks to get to an amazing scene that they've previewed but hasn't happened yet

when i texted e about how whether when the actor who plays zoe kravitz's dad shows up on _big little lies_, she ever thinks, as i do, "_no...she doesn't come from you_" and she immediately texted back "YES EVERY EPISODE LOL"

that picture of lenny kravitz with big scarf energy, which will never not be entertaining ([https://images.app.goo.gl/7QZf1kMMB5H6JLYs9](https://images.app.goo.gl/7QZf1kMMB5H6JLYs9))

sandwiches, doritos spicy enough to make me eat less than i would otherwise, blueberries, chocolate ice cream with fudge chunks in it

when the sky is soft and purple at dusk when i take miso out for last call and we stay out a little longer than we otherwise would to soak it in

phillip larkin's poem "home is so sad" (

[https://poets.org/poem/home-so-sad](https://poets.org/poem/home-so-sad))

got to spend several hours writing code without distractions and will hopefully get to do so again today

three more workdays until a week off

when you get out of work and you're in that pre-dinner "what are we going to watch tonight" phase and then remember that your favorite show is on that night

_the bachelorette_, even though the hometown visits were not as interesting as i wanted them to be and they've been stringing us along for weeks to get to an amazing scene that they've previewed but hasn't happened yet

when i texted e about how whether when the actor who plays zoe kravitz's dad shows up on _big little lies_, she ever thinks, as i do, "_no...she doesn't come from you_" and she immediately texted back "YES EVERY EPISODE LOL"

that picture of lenny kravitz with big scarf energy, which will never not be entertaining ([https://images.app.goo.gl/7QZf1kMMB5H6JLYs9](https://images.app.goo.gl/7QZf1kMMB5H6JLYs9))

when the sky is soft and purple at dusk when i take miso out for last call and we stay out a little longer than we otherwise would to soak it in

phillip larkin's poem "home is so sad" (

[https://poets.org/poem/home-so-sad](https://poets.org/poem/home-so-sad))

got to spend several hours writing code without distractions and will hopefully get to do so again today

three more workdays until a week off
